test.name: snippets vs multiwordforms

sphqueries.sphinxql: CALL SNIPPETS('Kph on Europe road 1110', 'test', 'kph', 1 AS query_mode )
CALL SNIPPETS('when you on+time do it', 'test', 'you on', 1 AS query_mode )
CALL SNIPPETS('when you on+time do it', 'test', 'you time', 1 AS query_mode )
CALL SNIPPETS('you on+time 0 es you 0 at', 'test', 'none', 1 AS query_mode )
CALL SNIPPETS('you on+time 0 es you 0 at', 'test', '0', 1 AS query_mode )
select id, SNIPPET('', '') as s from snip2 where match ('silver')
select id, SNIPPET('body as las void', 'las') as s from snip2 where match ('las')
select id, SNIPPET(body, 'las') as s from snip2 where match ('las')
select id, SNIPPET('something', snip2) from snip2
